page.title: 01VALLEY OF THE RIVER CLYST
page.content: This part of {East Devon }has been greatly influenced by the {River Clyst which is a tributary of the{River Exe. At this part of its course,the Clyst is for most of the year,an apparently insignificant stream with some pools which afford the opportunity for local children to swim.In winter the water level rises dramatically and can flood a wide area of farmland and affect some roads as the area is so flat and low lying. The centres of population are at {West Clyst, Clyst Honiton }and the village of{Pinhoe,}which, though it retains its identity, has become a suburb of {Exeter,}where most of the inhabitants of this area are employed.
